extraction_result.plan_title: FY25 Medtronic U.S. Cardiovascular (CV) Sales Incentive Plan
extraction_result.plan_summary: The FY25 Medtronic U.S. Cardiovascular (CV) Sales Incentive Plan provides the opportunity for participants to earn commissions and incentive compensation for selling identified products and/or achieving sales revenue goals in an assigned geography. The plan focuses on critical strategic imperatives and offers opportunities to earn through various bonuses and a recoverable draw.

compensation_components.name: Superficial Total District Revenue Bonus
compensation_components.structure: Earn a bonus for performance against a quarterly revenue quota for Total Superficial. Start earning at 75% attainment with additional earnings for each percent over quota.

compensation_components.name: Quarterly ASP Bonus
compensation_components.structure: Earn a bonus for performance against a quarterly ASP Target for your District. Performance defines a payout tier correlating to a fixed payout.

compensation_components.name: Superficial Quarterly VenaSeal Bonus
compensation_components.structure: Earn a bonus for performance against a quarterly revenue quota for Total VenaSeal Revenue. Start earning at 85% attainment with a cap at 100%.

compensation_components.name: Superficial District Capital Compliance Bonus
compensation_components.structure: Earn a bonus based on meeting compliance expectations for CAP customers. Performance against compliance targets defines a payout tier.

compensation_components.name: Expense Management Bonus
compensation_components.structure: Earn a bonus for keeping expenses within budget. Lower spend to expense quota attainments result in higher bonus payouts.

extraction_result.payout_schedule: Monthly payouts with quarterly earnings. Recoverable Draw of $10,000 for the first two months of each quarter, with true-up at quarter-end. Payouts generally occur within 45 days after the fiscal period close.
special_provisions: Recoverable Draw: Monthly good-faith payments with quarterly true-ups.
Year-End True Up: If annual quota is achieved and quarterly payouts are less than the target, the difference is paid at year-end.
Windfall Protection: Adjustments for one-time substantial orders to prevent windfall earnings.
Disruptive Disaster Plan: Adjustments for major disasters impacting business performance.
Plan may be amended or terminated at any time by the Operating Unit President and VP of Compensation.
